mod-description: Lets you adjust the difficulty of the dart minigame.
IllFormatedConfig: Config file seems ill-formated, using default. Please use Generic Mod Config Menu to configure.
api-too-old: Please update {{apiName}}({{APIID}}) to at least version {{minversion}}. Current version {{currentversion}}. Integration disabled.
MPPirateArrivalTime.title: Pirate Arrival Time in MP
MPPirateArrivalTime.description: Set this to allow the pirates to arrive earlier in multiplayer.
MinDartCount.title: Min Dart Count
MinDartCount.description: The number of darts for the hardest round of the game.
MaxDartCount.title: Max Dart Count
MaxDartCount.description: The number of darts for the easiest round of the game.
ShowDartMarker.title: Show Dart Marker
ShowDartMarker.description: Whether or not a more precise dart marker should be shown.
JitterMultiplier.title: Jitter Multiplier
JitterMultiplier.description: How fast the figure 8 jitter pattern should move in.
DartPrecision.title: Dart Precision
DartPrecision.description: Affects how much randomness affects the darts after throwing.
